name: Anime Game Backgrounds
description:
The model was trained on a total of 1048 background CGs from games mainly based upon what I was able to get a hold of easily.

Specific games were Arknights, Blue Archive, Girls Frontline, Shadowverse, and the Neptunia series.

For the most part images with people were left out except for some background crowds so the model is geared toward pure scenery.

meta.prompt: ,(masterpiece:1.3), ((best quality)), (incredibly absurdres), (4k), ((wallpaper)), fantasy, scenery, tombolo, magic, summer, midnight, stylized (by [(okami)|(log horizon)]), <lora:background_V2:0.7>
meta.negativePrompt:
(bad-artist:0.8), (bad_prompt:0.8), (NG_DeepNegative_V1_75T:0.8), (((watermark))), (((text))), ((logo)), ((frame)), nude, naked
Steps: 20, Sampler: Euler a, CFG scale: 7, Seed: 3875208548, Size: 768x512, Model hash: 0036435cab, Model: Anime_wintermoonmix_A-2208-2146-0051
